entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
